mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USERNAME, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, NAME, MOBILE, EMAIL, CCCD, PASSWORD, REGISTERED_AT FROM "user" WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE';

SELECT R.SLUG FROM "user" AS U INNER JOIN USER_ROLE AS USR ON U.USER_ID = USR.USER_ID INNER JOIN ROLE AS R ON R.ROLE_ID = USR.ROLE_ID WHERE U.USERNAME = #{username} AND R.ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE' AND U.ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE';
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM "user" WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE');
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM "user" WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE');
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM "user" WHERE PHONE = #{phone} AND ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE');
